name: Par 72 Golf IV
description:
Par 72 Golf is a realistic 3D golf game featuring three 18 hole courses set in mountain, desert, and seaside environments.

- Hilly courses change each time they are played
- Computer opponent
- Two player 'handoff' mode
- Male and female players
- Flyover preview

This free version is ad supported and may restrict access to holes 2-18 of each course. In-app purchase is available for ad-free play with full, permanent access to all holes of each course.
